abstracts.abstract: State Economic Development Contracts;  Requires employer to sign agreement with department before becoming eligible for economic development incentive; specifies provisions of agreement; provides applicability; authorizes persons & entities to report suspected violation to Attorney General within specified timeframe; requires Attorney General to determine whether violation has occurred; requires Attorney General to request certain information from employer alleged to be in violation; provides that refusal of such employer to provide such information is in violation of agreement; requires Attorney General to deliver his or her findings to such employer within specified timeframe; requires Attorney General to initiate proceedings to recover funds awarded to employer if employer is found to have violated agreement; provides that Attorney General's findings are final; requires department to execute separate written agreement with recipient of economic development incentive before department awards incentive; specifies contents of separate agreement; provides effective periods of separate agreement.
